description:
Uc-chan has finished repairing her UFO, so she takes Chi-chan and Joe-kun for a ride... but with both of them on board, the UFO crashes into Pii-chan! The gang decides to look after Pii-chan until its injuries heal.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Peck, Peck, Peck! Taking Care of Pii-chan!
スコココ! ピィちゃんお世話するでち!
